DELETE /zones/{zone_id}/ssl/certificate_.description: For a given zone, delete an advanced certificate pack.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

200.description: Delete Advanced Certificate Manager Certificate Pack response

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
Whether the API call was successful.

4XX.description: Delete Advanced Certificate Manager Certificate Pack response failure

DELETE /zones/{zone_id}/ssl/certificate_.summary: Delete Advanced Certificate Manager Certificate Pack

GET /zones/{zone_id}/ssl/certificate_pac.description: For a given zone, list all active certificate packs.

schema.description: Include Certificate Packs of all statuses, not just active ones.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters.

items.description: A certificate pack with all its properties.

certificate_authority.description: Certificate Authority selected for the order.  For information on any certificate authority specific details or restrictions [see this page for more details.](https://developers.cloudflare.com/ssl/reference/certificate-authorities)

certificates.description: Array of certificates in this pack.

items.description: An individual certificate within a certificate pack.

expires_on.description: When the certificate from the authority expires.

geo_restrictions.description: Specify the region where your private key can be held locally.

issuer.description: The certificate authority that issued the certificate.

modified_on.description: When the certificate was last modified.

priority.description: The order/priority in which the certificate will be used.

signature.description: The type of hash used for the certificate.

uploaded_on.description: When the certificate was uploaded to Cloudflare.

cloudflare_branding.description: Whether or not to add Cloudflare Branding for the order.  This will add a subdomain of sni.cloudflaressl.com as the Common Name if set to true.

hosts.description: Comma separated list of valid host names for the certificate packs. Must contain the zone apex, may not contain more than 50 hosts, and may not be empty.

primary_certificate.description: Identifier of the primary certificate in a pack.

validation_errors.description: Domain validation errors that have been received by the certificate authority (CA).

message.example: SERVFAIL looking up CAA for app.example.com

validation_method.description: Validation Method selected for the order.

emails.description: The set of email addresses that the certificate authority (CA) will use to complete domain validation.

http_body.description: The content that the certificate authority (CA) will expect to find at the http_url during the domain validation.

http_url.description: The url that will be checked during domain validation.

txt_name.description: The hostname that the certificate authority (CA) will check for a TXT record during domain validation .

txt_value.description: The TXT record that the certificate authority (CA) will check during domain validation.

validity_days.description: Validity Days selected for the order.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
